section.title: TRAFFIC_TIME
Description
section.para: The class TRAFFIC_TIME is the representation of time in the model. The time supports starting time, pausing time, resuming time and reseting time. The feature time_count counts the time according to the simulated minutes. The functionality of the class EM_TIME_SINGLETON by the feature add_callback_procedure which makes it possible not only to call a function every 'delay' time but also a procedure. The feature add_callback_tour provides the possibility to handle the tours otherwise because it could be the case that one doesn't want to call the tour in the same frequence as the other procedures. Some generic extension could be thought of so that every procedure can have its one frequency. To start the time just call call_procedures or call_tours with the time delay you want.
